    [D4] 1861. 정사각형 방

    1 분 소요

    1861. 정사각형 방

    Code

    import java.util.*;
 
class Room {
    int x;
    int y;
    int num;
 
    public Room(int x, int y, int num) {
        this.x = x;
        this.y = y;
        this.num = num;
    }
}
 
public class Solution {
    static int[] dr = { -1, 1, 0, 0 };
    static int[] dc = { 0, 0, -1, 1 };
    static int N;
    static int[][] arr;
    static int[][] cnt_arr;
    static int room_cnt = 1;
 
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
 
        int T = sc.nextInt();
        int cnt = 0;
 
        for (int tc = 1; tc <= T; tc++) {
            N = sc.nextInt();
 
            arr = new int[N][N];
            cnt_arr = new int[N][N];
 
            for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
                for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
                    arr[i][j] = sc.nextInt();
                }
            }
 
            for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
                for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
                    dfs(i, j);
                    cnt_arr[i][j] = room_cnt;
                    cnt++;
                    room_cnt = 1;
                }
            }
 
            int max = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
                for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
                    max = Math.max(max, cnt_arr[i][j]);
                }
            }
 
            ArrayList<Room> list = new ArrayList<Room>();
 
            for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
                for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
                    if (cnt_arr[i][j] == max) {
                        list.add(new Room(i, j, arr[i][j]));
                    }
                }
            }
 
            Collections.sort(list, new Comparator<Room>() {
 
                @Override
                public int compare(Room r1, Room r2) {
                    return r1.num - r2.num;
                }
            });
 
            System.out.print("#" + tc + " ");
 
            System.out.print(list.get(0).num + " " + max);
 
            System.out.println();
 
        }
    }
 
    static void dfs(int i, int j) {
 
        for (int d = 0; d < 4; d++) {
            int nr = i + dr[d];
            int nc = j + dc[d];
            if (nr >= 0 && nc >= 0 && nr < N && nc < N) {
                if ((arr[nr][nc] - arr[i][j]) == 1) {
                    dfs(nr, nc);
                    room_cnt++;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    문제점

    정렬할 때 Comparator를 썼는데 다시 공부해보고 풀어봐야겠다.

    카테고리: Swea

    업데이트: February 14, 2020
